Posts.Content: Take care !  ..try not to worry...  Im sure your dad would just want his daughter to be ok . big hug Maggie xx
Posts.Title: Fifth day of radiotherapy, and my sister rings me ...

Posts.Content: Don't you dare let that little shit of a human get to you ......   I never took notice of anything my body did,  till this ,  now I only have to cough twice and im worried im dying  So no like we all said , ...no friend of yours or anyone else for that matter.  Get checked out hun,  and next time you see her cross the road love Maggie  xxxx
Posts.Title: Really bloody angry !!!

Posts.Content: You will be fine sweety ! trust me .. it really is quite painless as our friends have all mentioned on here.. Please don't worry if you bruise after for a while , that's normal too. best wishes and take care Maggie xxx
Posts.Title: 22yo terrified of core biopsy - and, well, everything

Posts.Content: Next time throw your shoes at her and say 'walk in these for just a bloody day ' ....and tell her not to go round a corner cause you never know what's round there .  I'm so angry at her comment.  Thoughtless twat !  Please foget that nasty comment .  you better and stronger than that Hun take care xxxx
Posts.Title: Really bloody angry !!!

Posts.Content: Absolutely ! I wish the nasty women could read all these posts from people who have never met but are real friends maggie xxxx
Posts.Title: Really bloody angry !!!

Posts.Content: hi Gilly What you have described is me exactly.  But to scared not to take them , I have my first follow up on Thursday. ill talk it over with the oncologist .  Im 6 months into anastrozole.  fed up !  would love the scatty me back,  running round like an idiot on the go none stop at work ,and home . love Maggie x
Posts.Title: Side effects of medication

Posts.Content: Anastrozole, my moods are all over the place , crazy, tears one minute, angry next ... absolutely knackered all of the time , hope it settles soon x
Posts.Title: Aches and pains ....... still!!!

Posts.Content: Hello Annie I have been  anastrozole for 4 months and use my usual loreal permanent . I do it every month and had no problems what so ever Im blessed with thick hair , but havn,t noticed any thinning at all. Im taking cod liver oil with vit D, too to help with the bones and aches and pains, So my be its helping my hair stay shiny too. I think we can overthink things sometimes , but us ladies need to have our hair looking nice don't we and we deserve too Hope this helps, take care Maggie xx
Posts.Title: Anastrozole and hair dye.

Posts.Content: Treat yourself to some nice sexy bras ! You deserve it Xxx
Posts.Title: Post surgery sports bras

Posts.Content: We have a life to live despite having this dreadful desease, go on your holiday Hun and enjoy every second , Annie I'm going away in June after my first follow up in May , which like you I'm dreading  . I also still have my glass of wine and an occasional ciggy ... , naughty I know but we have got to live with cancer and I think stressing bout what you can and can't do makes you more ill. It doesn't matter how healthy a lifestyle you have,  it comes anyway . Maggie xxx
Posts.Title: Increaseed risk of cancer in other breast -why?

Posts.Content: Crystaljuju CARDBOND I see alot of people say their lump felt pea size. I'm wondering if anyone felt a larger lump. And am curious to know how big their lump actually was in reality..... In comparison to pea size, mine felt like pebble size!! I stumbled  across it. In hindsight I was bad at checking my breasts or rather I wasn't thorough enough.  On diagnosis it was sized at 35mm but was actually 25mm. Id never had a mammogram before diagnosis as hadn't reached that age. However.... after chemo there was nothing left   Julia x great news Julia,  x
Posts.Title: Curious.....
